title: Programming & Analysis
description: Programming basics, algorithms, time and space complexity, and asymptotic notations.

title: Arrays & Strings
description: Arrays, 2D arrays, strings, prefix sum, sliding window, and two-pointer technique.

title: Searching & Sorting
description: Learn essential searching algorithms (linear, binary, search on answer) and sorting algorithms (bubble, selection, insertion, merge, quick, counting, radix) with complexity analysis.

title: Recursion & Backtracking
description: Recursion fundamentals, recursion tree visualisation, and backtracking strategies.

title: Linked Structures
description: Singly linked list, doubly linked list, and circular linked list with operations.

title: Stack & Queue
description: Stack, queue, circular queue, deque, monotonic stack, monotonic queue, and priority queue.

title: Hashing
description: Hashing concepts, hash tables, collision handling, HashMap, and HashSet.

title: Trees
description: Tree terminology, binary tree, tree traversals (DFS and BFS), BST, and balanced trees.

title: Heap
description: Heap data structure, heapify operation, heap sort, and priority queue usage.

title: Graphs
description: Graph representation, BFS, DFS, cycle detection, topological sort, shortest path, and MST.

title: Greedy Algorithms
description: Greedy strategy, activity selection problem, and scheduling problems.

title: Dynamic Programming
description: DP fundamentals, memoization, tabulation, 1D DP, and 2D DP with classic problems.

title: Bit Manipulation
description: Binary numbers, bitwise AND/OR/XOR, bit masking, and bit shifting.

title: Advanced DS
description: Trie (prefix tree) and Disjoint Set (Union-Find) data structures.
